data.text:
"We have to make peace with nature."

In Indonesia, @AminaJMohammed meets with young people and other #ClimateAction leaders and encourages them to continue to their efforts #ForNature. https://t.co/fzuTzlRCVf

Urgent action is needed to move from #RiskToResilience & safeguard our world from threats like #COVID19, the climate crisis & more.

This week, leaders are meeting in Bali, Indonesia to share solutions for protecting people & planet. 

More from @UNDRR. https://t.co/f3G2CzdDr1 https://t.co/ywCMmZhoXT

All of us can help protect our seas & oceans: 

🍴 Avoid single-use plastics.
🏖️ Participate in beach clean-ups.
🐟 Only eat seafood from sustainable fisheries.

The UN Ocean Conference in Portugal in June will focus on more solutions to #SaveOurOcean. https://t.co/at0qxwl8WJ https://t.co/1llX8cCt5B

The number of people #ForcedToFlee around the world due to war, persecution & human rights abuses has reached a record-breaking 100 million. 

UNHCR urges more action to promote peace & address all causes of forced displacement. https://t.co/PBE16irVuT via @Refugees https://t.co/Th58scwPLk

45,800

That’s the number of 10- to 19-year-olds that die from suicide each year.

@UNICEF is calling for urgent investment in life-saving mental health & psychosocial services. https://t.co/bzBI4S6S8A #OnMyMind #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth
 https://t.co/PLq22uAUl7

Obstructed labour is one of the leading causes of maternal death and obstetric fistula.

@UNFPA has more facts about this preventable condition and ideas about how you can take action to help #EndFistula: https://t.co/ygoNqg7NgZ https://t.co/X4VQsPRr9y

Armed conflicts continue to drive human suffering around the world -- and civilians bear the highest cost.

During this Protection of Civilians Week, help us spread the word: 

Civilians are #NotATarget.

More from @UNOCHA: https://t.co/Z5prF30l5K https://t.co/4hWfl1g9Ms

Of all the things fistula can take from women, the most painful is their own child.

Ending this preventable condition is within our reach.

More from @UNFPA on Monday's #EndFistula Day: https://t.co/ygoNqg7NgZ https://t.co/ORNwnFbeGb

Rich & healthy soils are the basis of all life on Earth.

Yet, up to 40% of the planet’s land is degraded, affecting half the world’s population.

Here's how @UNDP is taking #ClimateAction to undo the damage: 
https://t.co/sCWqAXGKBR https://t.co/9CLe9cq9rJ

No woman should suffer needlessly from a preventable condition like fistula, yet an estimated 500,000 women and girls live with it globally.

On Monday's #EndFistula Day, see what @UNFPA is doing to help women overcome this devastating childbirth injury: https://t.co/ygoNqfQcpr https://t.co/31kAZbJrJN

This week's @WMO #StateOfClimate report reveals four key climate change indicators  – greenhouse gas concentrations, sea-level rise, ocean heat & ocean acidification – all set new records in 2021.

We need urgent #ClimateAction now! https://t.co/XktiFxsE7T https://t.co/WhE7mTnv2k

Human activity is driving biodiversity loss around the world — but we can all do something about it. 

On Sunday's #BiodiversityDay, see how you can be part of the solution #ForNature: https://t.co/uUAIfopqfa via @UNBiodiversity https://t.co/IZjf8n2bgL

Education is a human right and everyone has the right to access a quality education. 

@UN_Women works for gender equality and the empowerment of girls & women around the world. https://t.co/9DkJpsxvFB https://t.co/G7yxpWp7g6

Illiteracy hinders people from acquiring basic skills & prevents them from fully participating in their communities & societies.

Learn how @UNESCO is advancing literacy worldwide: https://t.co/qylblyvPCH https://t.co/xzjDOmrdoy

🪲 Help animals.
⚡️ Save energy.
🌳 Plant a tree.
🗨️ Raise awareness.

These are just a few ways you can celebrate Sunday's #BiodiversityDay. 

More ideas from @UNBiodiversity: https://t.co/kgtAWjXQxK https://t.co/pxEvf0YaWc

The war in Ukraine is having impacts far beyond the country’s borders, as surging food prices put vulnerable children at risk. 

@UNICEF is providing life-saving treatment but more must be done to save millions of children suffering from severe wasting. https://t.co/GGGUo8yYnR

Sunday's #BiodiversityDay is a reminder that we all have a role to play in protecting the incredible diversity of life on Earth. 

@UNBiodiversity has 22 #ClimateAction suggestions you can take #ForNature: https://t.co/kgtAWjGfGc https://t.co/7Qn7IK0oUf

The World Health Assembly gets underway on Sunday.

Countries will gather in Geneva to lay the foundation for an inclusive global health agenda aimed at building back better from #COVID19. https://t.co/cA4rAZYjUw #WHA75 https://t.co/P2XhES9waH

Tea is one of the world's most popular beverages, consumed by people all across the globe. 

Saturday's #InternationalTeaDay is an opportunity to celebrate the cultural significance, health benefits & economic importance of tea. https://t.co/6PiU3D2B5M https://t.co/IgLYlAQ5t1

Culture builds bridges between people & countries, and as a driving force for development, it is essential to achieving the #GlobalGoals.

Saturday is World Day for #CulturalDiversity for Dialogue & Development: https://t.co/77EExuGQjS https://t.co/iwD7BCSW6t

Tea has many health benefits thanks to its anti-inflammatory & antioxidant properties. 

On Saturday's #InternationalTeaDay, @FAO has more about one of the world's most popular beverages: https://t.co/6PiU3CKZHc https://t.co/iUuBzRXL62

The Universal Declaration of Human Rights has helped improve the lives of millions of people and lay the foundations for a more just world.

Now, more than ever, each of us can take action to #StandUp4HumanRights. https://t.co/GqGzc9eHul https://t.co/U4ACV5CZtD

Tea is central to many cultures, and contributes to employment, exports earnings & food security. 

More on Saturday's #InternationalTeaDay: https://t.co/EfW1b60HqS https://t.co/CDzyfHebPd

Words can be weapons. 

Hate speech online can lead to cruelty & violence in real life. 

Get tips for how you can say #NoToHate: https://t.co/7KugkNkHMJ https://t.co/0VAKC30FIM

Senior UN officials met with representatives from 86 countries on Friday to recommit to efforts to end sexual exploitation & abuse and sexual harassment. 

The rights & dignity of victims and accountability for perpetrators remain the foremost priority. https://t.co/YJW5XxcyMi https://t.co/vYEwWWfofu

Friday is #WorldBeeDay! 🐝

Bees face many dangers due to human activities -- but we can all help protect them & support beekeepers by growing native plants, buying honey from local farmers & taking #ClimateAction. https://t.co/Ap7R2yObxA https://t.co/PVypYtGA35

A record 59.1 million people were internally displaced within the last year -- 4 million more than in 2020. 

@UNmigration warns that without urgent #ClimateAction, the number of people forced from their homes is likely to continue increasing. https://t.co/cnlR0kbGwJ

Much of the food we eat depends on bees 🐝.

These guardians of biodiversity play a 🗝️ role in achieving the #GlobalGoals. 

Learn more from @FAO on Friday's #WorldBeeDay: https://t.co/Al7j0AYZt5 https://t.co/DBOd6LelXj

#COVID19 & measures to combat the pandemic have had cascading effects on all societies. 

A new @UNDRR & @UNUEHS report analyzes these effects, offering recommendations for risk management moving forward:  https://t.co/4ehsIAZKbH https://t.co/FTHcIb0eCS

Bees...
🍓 help improve global food security 
🍯 provide livelihoods for millions of people
🌱 help maintain biodiversity

On Friday's #WorldBeeDay, @FAO shares 6 ways we can 'bee' grateful to & protect our pollinators: https://t.co/mTl8OmzJno https://t.co/kWqrCpgC5H

44 million people in 38 countries are experiencing emergency levels of hunger & are just steps away from famine.

60% of undernourished people live in areas affected by conflict. 

On Thursday, the Security Council discussed conflict & food security. https://t.co/MNOkNqGwYx https://t.co/DQE95d7IYT

Our very existence depends on bees & other pollinators 🐝🦋🐦.

On Friday's #WorldBeeDay, let's celebrate the vital role they play in maintaining our food supply & contributing to biodiversity. https://t.co/QwDgqj3arO via @FAO https://t.co/VtlseekVSh

"Over 80% of the world’s migrants move between countries in a safe & orderly fashion. But unregulated migration – the cruel realm of traffickers – continues to extract a terrible cost."

-- @antonioguterres tells first International Migration Review Forum. https://t.co/cZIlS3y5Le https://t.co/0UqKXykkS8

"Feeding the hungry is an investment in global peace & security."

-- @antonioguterres tells members of the Security Council that in our world of plenty, he will never accept a single child, woman or man starving to death - and neither should they. https://t.co/wcsCGNEPOw https://t.co/i3XtqzEehI

Reducing food waste helps:

🍜 fight food insecurity
🌎 protect precious resources
👣 reduce our carbon footprint
💰 save money & energy
🦹 consume more consciously

@FAO has quick tips on how to reduce your food waste: https://t.co/G6w0wFuD7w https://t.co/y5uqrgiTTq

Higher education belongs to everyone, everywhere. 🎓

This week, @UNESCO's Higher Education Conference is bringing people together from all over the world to seek solutions for expanding access to education for all. 

https://t.co/QV0FxOyLUW https://t.co/Djpff44vlx

1 in 10 people don't have access to electricity.

Without universal access to energy, we won't be able to achieve the #GlobalGoals.

The #SEforAllForum aims to accelerate #ClimateAction for a just energy transition.

More from @SEforALLorg: https://t.co/TfEJggNdt9

"Our only chance of lifting millions of people out of hunger is to act together, urgently & with solidarity."

-- @antonioguterres tells Global Food Security Call to Action ministerial meeting. https://t.co/LNJkziRZcb

🔋 Technology
📈 Investments
📋 Policies
🪨  Materials
💰 Subsidies

@antonioguterres outlines 5 critical #ClimateAction tools to transform our energy systems & jump start the transition to renewables. https://t.co/9ji7YYB706 https://t.co/eX0kdGkeu2

1 in 10 children globally is in child labour.

New report from @ILO & @UNICEF shows investment in social protection could save up to 160 million lost childhoods. https://t.co/3KtZkpisSH

 https://t.co/dtykAbpM0m

The war in Ukraine has put the fragile economic recovery from #COVID19 in jeopardy. 

Amid rising global inflation, @UNDESA's latest #WorldEconomyReport revises worldwide growth estimates downwards for 2022. 

Details: https://t.co/bIeTdOwm59 https://t.co/WIv2dbTmUn

"Fossil fuels are a dead end — environmentally and economically."

-- @antonioguterres calls for 5 essential actions to accelerate the transition to renewables, says global energy system bringing world ever closer to climate catastrophe. https://t.co/9ji7YYB706 #ClimateAction https://t.co/O95QsmJhjO

Latest global climate report from @WMO reveals four key climate change indicators  – greenhouse gas concentrations, sea-level rise, ocean heat & ocean acidification - all set new records in 2021.

Findings demonstrate need for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/XktiFxsE7T https://t.co/t5uWbmHyOR

Careers have no gender.

Girls' education is one of the most powerful investments we can make for our collective future.

https://t.co/grVGCyJ2eW via @UNESCO https://t.co/PGFwg7cGqZ

Wednesday's first-ever International #WomenInMaritimeDay aims to empower women & celebrate their contributions to the maritime community. 

More from @IMOHQ: https://t.co/7HX2XH6W7u https://t.co/83M9kv3gfo

1 in 5 people who have lived through war experiences mental health issues. 

Mental health support is not a luxury -- it is an essential service for people forced to flee.

https://t.co/0pRVxrIPOp via @Refugees #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth https://t.co/aM5lhK0HEp

Women are an integral part of the maritime workforce.

Wednesday's first-ever International #WomenInMaritimeDay is an opportunity to promote & celebrate their contributions to the maritime community.  

More from @IMOHQ. https://t.co/7HX2XGPlfW https://t.co/dSF4l0zCLX

Mexico: “No effort should be spared to put an end to these human rights violations & abuses of extraordinary breadth."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet calls for truth & justice for more than 100,000 disappeared people and their families in the country. https://t.co/0lTXEd39pB

Nearly 14 million children under 5 suffer from severe wasting, the most lethal form of undernutrition -- and the war in Ukraine has only worsened the situation.

@UNICEF says urgent action is needed to end this devastating, but preventable emergency. https://t.co/GGGUo8yYnR

The #COVID19 crisis has highlighted the critical role of information & communication technologies, while also exposing the stark digital divide between & within countries. 

Tuesday is World Telecommunication & Information Society Day. https://t.co/SUmSwuf9mv #WTISD https://t.co/MfVhF68iES

"The UN is proud to support & uphold the fundamental human rights & dignity of all people – including LGBTIQ+ people. 
I call on everyone to join us to build a world of peace, inclusion, freedom & equality for all."

-- @antonioguterres on #IDAHOBIT. https://t.co/m3PRDXzLSe https://t.co/rQJG9ZUKX1

Lifestyle choices can help prevent high blood pressure.

🥦 Eat healthily
🚭 Avoid tobacco
🍺 Reduce alcohol
🏃 Stay active

More tips from @WHO on Tuesday's World Hypertension Day: https://t.co/v5uQgDWQ9t https://t.co/GPZKMQIIaW

Telecommunications & information technologies play an important role in achieving healthier ageing.

More from @ITU on Tuesday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day: https://t.co/ieSmBVCms2 https://t.co/1k5n0cxV7Y

"Child labour is a violation of a basic human right, and our goal must be that every child, everywhere is free from it. We cannot rest until that happens.”

-- @ilo chief @GuyRyder as @ilo's Global Conference to #EndChildLabour gets underway. https://t.co/6jhIV7xW8q

Love makes a family. 

And only love & acceptance can break the cycle of stigma that blights the lives of too many LGBTIQ+ people. 

Help build a world where ALL families are recognized and protected. https://t.co/ycsPA748um via @free_equal #IDAHOBIT https://t.co/BXxxwB0IAa

Countries are coming together at the Commission on Crime Prevention & Criminal Justice this week to focus on strengthening the use of digital evidence in criminal justice & countering cybercrime. 

Details form @UNODC: https://t.co/nlqv099u2h https://t.co/ElB2XWdDvN
@Nzarishakulu12 @MelissaFleming Thank you for your interest. For more details about job opportunities at the United Nations, please go to https://t.co/J6VgGEYRTJ
@olakemieky @MelissaFleming Thank you for your interest. For more details about job opportunities at the United Nations, please go to https://t.co/J6VgGEYRTJ
@theaquaofthesea @MelissaFleming Thank you for your interest. For more details about job opportunities at the United Nations, please go to https://t.co/J6VgGEYRTJ

Racism, intolerance & discrimination tear at the fabric of our societies, which is a tragedy for everybody. 

But everyone, everywhere can take action to spread compassion, tolerance & acceptance.

Get ideas about how YOU can help #FightRacism. https://t.co/cCd3Jk32kt https://t.co/idMYdZzzUP

📷: The "Knotted Gun" sculpture is a universal symbol of non-violence on display at UNHQ in NYC. 

Monday is the International Day of Living Together in Peace. https://t.co/6wep5krQrQ https://t.co/GCAE1I1gtK

From medicine to communications, from science to art, Monday's International #DayOfLight provides an opportunity to reflect on the multitude of ways light influences our daily lives. https://t.co/aIT9vDUCWX https://t.co/eNsZdSSAAc

The UN promotes peace, tolerance, inclusion, understanding & solidarity around the world. 

Monday is the International Day of Living Together in Peace. https://t.co/6wep5krQrQ https://t.co/nZM3WrVLPZ

Warm wishes to all those celebrating Vesak!

Learn more as people around the world celebrate the Day of the Full Moon: https://t.co/7xyParl9We

📸: #Vesak celebration at UNHQ in NYC in 2018 https://t.co/QX3uKMjvcA

Monday is International #DayOfLight. 

Join @UNESCO in celebrating the role light plays in science, culture, art, education & the #GlobalGoals - as well as the hope it can bring in challenging times. https://t.co/aIT9vEcelx https://t.co/qgPSHL06CZ

War is not the answer.

We need peace.

Peace for the world.

We need peace now.

Monday is the International Day of Living Together in Peace. https://t.co/ommxgvhpRU

Civilians are bearing the brunt of the war in Ukraine.

The UN is working tirelessly to provide life-saving aid to the most vulnerable.

Donate here to support our efforts: https://t.co/z2K5HvkX0L https://t.co/cSc3NYbEOZ

The odds of at least 1 of the next 5 years temporarily reaching the #ParisAgreement threshold of 1.5°C warming have increased to 50:50, @WMO warned this week. 

We need urgent and ambitious #ClimateAction now. 
https://t.co/X71rNZ5vxd https://t.co/qGbZkPxo35

Families belong together.

Yet, many refugees who have been forced to flee remain separated from their loved ones.
 
Learn how UNHCR supports refugees & helps safeguard their fundamental right to family unity. https://t.co/5FW9ZcEc9x #DayOfFamilies https://t.co/LyKzBWZpxr

Amid the current crisis in Ethiopia, women are facing increased risks of:

🟠 Sexual violence
🟠 Exploitation
🟠 HIV infection

See how @UNFPA is taking action to prioritize their health, rights and needs: https://t.co/0mmQCoD4nA https://t.co/rxy4pTu3QG

Family means different things to different people – but at its core, family means love & support. 

Sunday's International #DayOfFamilies celebrates families in all their diversity. https://t.co/xDvdkXDZ5F https://t.co/4kqvEalFGM

Women do 3 times as much unpaid care & domestic work as men.

Sunday's #DayOfFamilies is an opportunity to draw attention to gender stereotypes & find solutions to redistribute unpaid care & domestic work. https://t.co/i2eHGJn8qO https://t.co/hIMEnNyFYG

Indigenous peoples are not simply victims of the climate crisis -- they are part of the solution.

-- SDG Advocate @hindououmar talks about the indispensable role that indigenous communities play in taking #ClimateAction & protecting life on our planet. https://t.co/J203xvO3XL

If social media has ever made you feel anxious, you’re not alone.

Check out these useful tips from @UNICEF on looking after your mental health and being kind online. #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth
https://t.co/Goiov0V4MC

📚 Learning
🧸 Playing
🌟 Dreaming
This is how childhood should be spent. 

Yet, millions of girls & boys are trapped in child labour.

@ilo's Global Conference to #EndChildLabour starts Saturday in Durban. https://t.co/LIXKUD2mCi https://t.co/ACiEpzblbf

Migratory birds face many dangers. 

From plastic pollution to habitat loss and the impacts of the climate crisis, migrating birds are increasingly under threat from human activity.

More on Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay: https://t.co/rbBadVpreV https://t.co/fYKs3cNOGh

Migratory birds connect not only ecosystems but also people and nations. 

We all have a responsibility to ensure the diverse habitats migratory birds transit are protected.

More on Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay: https://t.co/rbBadV7PQl https://t.co/qYlqag25TT

What does it take to work for the UN in some of the world’s most difficult & dangerous situations to help the most vulnerable?

In season 5 of our award-winning podcast "Awake at Night", @MelissaFleming talks to extraordinary UN staff members to find out! https://t.co/5sKeBAHNaq https://t.co/cIJzCmiN6g

Excessive artificial light at night can disorient birds & light pollution contributes to the death of millions of birds annually due to collisions.

On Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay, dim the lights for the birds at night.

More at: https://t.co/jgct0ILVxF https://t.co/Mx0E1yYtIw

Every year, unhealthy diets cause 11 million deaths.

New UN-backed initiative will promote affordable healthy diets from sustainable food systems to:
⚕️ prevent disease
🤝 ensure decent work
🌱 protect our planet

 https://t.co/Vo5zIkQ34Y

The war in Ukraine is causing immense human suffering & leaving entire communities devastated.

9 out of 10 people could be pushed into poverty & decades of development gains are at risk.

See how @UNDP is trying to help: https://t.co/HEKDEqZIg7

 https://t.co/1npgSlEicy

1.38+ billion #COVID19 vaccines,
30.5+ million treatment units,
20.1+ million diagnostic tests,
and more. 

See how @UNICEF continues to deliver essential supplies to support countries’ pandemic response programmes: https://t.co/xmneE6WASO https://t.co/QAg6Sq5lEb

Ukraine: Millions of people continue to flee & remain displaced from their homes due the war. 

UNHCR has 5 ways you can stand #WithRefugees from Ukraine. ⬇️ https://t.co/Qn6PXFriv8 https://t.co/j2cPLfl2qN

Happy birthday to UN Messenger of Peace @StevieWonder!

Thank you for your tireless work to promote a more inclusive world for people with disabilities. https://t.co/f1tAutTjHi https://t.co/kb62Q49YQN

Every child has the right to grow up free from fear.

The rights of children affected by violence must be safeguarded. 

@UNICEF is working to protect children in conflict zones around the world. 

They are #NotATarget! https://t.co/r39EMICFhH https://t.co/GiQMyYqTdn

Women & girls represent half of the global population, yet, no country in the world has achieved gender equality. 

Advancing women's empowerment is critical for the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/4YRNa2bB6M https://t.co/7yyxYrM6Jp

"We must explore all options to reach more people where needs are the greatest."

-- @UNOCHA's @JoyceMsuya tells Security Council that Mariupol evacuations are a glimmer of hope in Ukraine as UN remains firmly committed to saving lives. https://t.co/IxhPGsmWrV

Ukraine: @refugees has reached 700,000+ people inside the country with critical aid such as shelter materials, food, legal counseling & psychosocial support.

The generosity of donors helps provide this lifesaving assistance. https://t.co/Qn6PXFriv8

 https://t.co/N72H05yhIY

“The only way to bring a stop to further violations is to end the hostilities."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet tells special session of @UN_HRC on deteriorating human rights situation in Ukraine stemming from Russian aggression. https://t.co/uCmp6lqVNq

What does it mean to #BeSeenBeHeard?

It means getting an equal say in your future!

Join @UNYouthEnvoy in advocating for a future that recognizes young people's political participation as a driving force for positive change. https://t.co/SVXvj6UKLN https://t.co/l4Uz3q0Qp2

More than 200 attacks on health care facilities & health workers in Ukraine have been confirmed by @WHO since the start of the war. 

On Thursday's #InternationalNursesDay, help spread the word: 

Health workers are #NotATarget https://t.co/fdz8r3ApoI

Our health & the health of our 🌍 depend on plants 🌱. 

Yet, they are under threat.

On the first ever International #PlantHealthDay, @FAO shares what everyone can do to protect them. https://t.co/xVQzAIY15g https://t.co/bWM2clgnyL

The conflict in Ukraine is a sobering reminder that even in the 21st century, war in Europe is not an impossibility, top UN representative for Bosnia & Herzegovina tells Security Council, urging dialogue amid rising tensions in the country. https://t.co/epSf2pxwbk

Nurses play a key role in improving health, preventing disease, community care & more.

On Thursday's #InternationalNursesDay, we thank them for looking after us despite the risks posed by #COVID19 & other crises. https://t.co/eoQrbVdpky https://t.co/HJgJiLZpcx

Destruction of natural habitats & ecosystems has left both plant & human life exposed. 

Plants are our main source of food & nutrition -- we need to protect them!

More from @FAO on the first ever International Day of Plant Health. https://t.co/xVQzAIY15g #PlantHealthDay https://t.co/0GtoeUNgxE

On Thursday, the Human Rights Council will hold a special session on the war in Ukraine.

Follow @UN_HRC for updates. https://t.co/Vw8PCYYJEh https://t.co/gKd6kFNDId
